sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN booking_status='IssuedBusiness' THEN 1 END) as bookings FROM sme_analytics.sme_leadbookingrevenue WHERE investmenttypeid IN (1) AND leaddate >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '1' MONTH AND leaddate < DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) AND ( LOWER(CAST(mkt_category AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%hdfc%%' OR LOWER(CAST(leadcreationsource AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%hdfc%%' OR LOWER(CAST(booking_status AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%hdfc%%' OR LOWER(CAST(insurername AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%hdfc%%' OR LOWER(CAST(insurerfullname AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%hdfc%%' )
explanation: Metric: bookings; Products: [1]; Time: last month
